title: Organize project navigation into proper menubar structure
description:
The current button-based UX is not scalable for the project. With the growing number of menu items, we need to organize them into a proper menubar structure.

Current issues:
- Too many navigation buttons displayed horizontally
- Not scalable as more features are added
- Poor use of screen space
- Difficult to organize related features

Requirements:
1. Implement proper shadcn menubar with dropdown menus
2. Group related features into logical categories:
   - Main: Chat, History
   - Knowledge: Memory, Context, Files
   - Settings: Embed, Extensions
3. Use keyboard shortcuts for common actions
4. Maintain current functionality while improving UX
5. Ensure mobile responsiveness

Reference: https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/menubar

Files to modify:
- frontend/src/components/layout/project-navigation.tsx

title: Fix inconsistent page containers and responsive layout issues
description:
Currently all pages do not use consistent containers, and the responsive design is broken. Several issues need to be addressed:

Problems:
- Pages do not use consistent container components
- Responsive layout is broken across different screen sizes
- Elements overlap with each other on certain screen sizes
- Scroll behavior is broken/gets stuck
- No standardized layout wrapper for pages

Impact:
- Poor user experience on mobile and tablet devices
- Inconsistent spacing and sizing across pages
- Navigation and content overlap issues
- Scrolling issues make content inaccessible

Requirements:
1. Create a consistent Page/Container component
2. Ensure proper spacing from navigation elements
3. Fix z-index layering to prevent overlaps
4. Implement proper scroll containers
5. Ensure responsive behavior on all screen sizes
6. Test on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

Pages to audit and fix:
- frontend/src/components/pages/main-chat.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/memory-editor.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/context-editor.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/conversation-history.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/files-manager.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/embed-settings.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/extensions-settings.tsx
- frontend/src/components/pages/extension-editor.tsx

Priority: High - affects usability across all pages
close_reason: Successfully standardized page containers and fixed navigation overlap across all 8 pages. All pages now use consistent 60px navigation offset with responsive horizontal padding. Build passed with no TypeScript errors.

title: Refactor UI layout into separate component and implement shadcn menubar
description:
Currently the project UI layout is entangled with the router code. We need to:

1. Extract the UI layout into a separate component
2. Replace the current icon tabs with shadcn menubar component (https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/components/menubar)
3. Decouple layout logic from routing logic

This will improve code organization and make the UI more maintainable.

Files to investigate:
- Router configuration files
- Current layout/navigation components
- Any icon tab implementations
